
{{Server client function}}
The function returns the byte position at specified character position.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
int utfSeek ( string theString, int position )
</syntaxhighlight>

===Required Arguments===
*'''theString:''' The [[/string.md|string]].
*'''position:''' An [[/int.md|int]] with the specified charachter position.

===Returns===
Returns an ''[[/int.md|int]]'' if the function was successful, ''false'' otherwise.

===Example===
<section name="Example" class="both" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
local teststring = "Hello World"
local testseek = utfSeek ( teststring, 5 )
outputChatBox ( testseek )
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>
